# particle-swarm-optimization

To install dependencies:

```bash
bun install
```

To run:

```bash
bun run index.ts
```

To run the tests:

```bash
bun test
```

To check formatting:

```bash
bun run format

# Ran on 2025-05-18 23:33:21+01:00 for 1.679s exited with 0
Command 'qalias' not found, did you mean:
  command '0alias' from deb 0install-core (2.18-2build2)
Try: sudo apt install <deb name>
$ biome format
Checked 9 files in 4ms. No fixes applied.
```

This project was created using `bun init` in bun v1.2.4. [Bun](https://bun.sh) is a fast all-in-one JavaScript runtime.
